-A|--async-only: --- Require all tests to use a callback (async) or return a Promise [boolean]
--delay: ---  Delay initial execution of root suite [boolean]
--exit: ---  Force Mocha to quit after tests complete [boolean]
--fail-zero: --- Fail test run if no test(s) encountered [boolean]
-j|--jobs: --- Number of concurrent jobs for --parallel; use 1 to run in serial [number] [default: (number of CPU cores - 1)]
--retries: --- Retry failed tests this many times [number]
--config: --- Path to config file [string] [default: (nearest rc file)]
--file: ---  Specify file(s) to be loaded prior to root suite ; execution [array] [default: (none)]
-w|--watch: ---  Watch files in the current working directory for changes [boolean]
--watch-files: --- List of paths or globs to watch [array]
--watch-ignore: ---  List of paths or globs to exclude from watching [array] [default: ["node_modules",".git"]]
-f|--fgrep: --- Only run tests containing this string [string]
-g|--grep: ---  Only run tests matching this string or regexp [string]
spec: ---  One or more files, directories, or globs to test [array] [default: ["test"]]
